ï¼ˆä»¿å†™ç»“æŸï¼‰

Iâ€™m trying to slow down to get information.

My time for thinking and my space for imagining are more precious as the cost of getting information goes down. But to think and to imagine need my mind to work at a slow speed.
Grok is a good tool to learn English and to polish my writing up https://t.co/fJfepnClt1

Elon Musk is undeniably intelligent.

However, his policy of offering $100 monthly ad revenue sharing to X users with 10,000+ followers has incentivized constant postingâ€”effectively turning content creation into a 24/7 grind.

This has significantly degraded the platformâ€™s environment, especially within the Chinese X community. Large amounts of low-effort, recycled contentâ€”originally from Zhihu, Weibo, and Douyinâ€”have flooded in, attracting views through sensationalism rather than substance.

I once believed X hosted high-quality discourse and thoughtful writers. That perception, it turns out, was only temporary.
